meanings.definition: Situated or occurring beneath a capsule.
meanings.sent1: The subcapsular region of the kidney is protected by a thin layer.
meanings.sent2: Doctors found a subcapsular hematoma during the patient's ultrasound.
meanings.sent3: The subcapsular squirrel hid its acorns under a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like subcapsular secrets, hidden from everyone.
meanings.sent5: The subcapsular glow of the moon illuminated the night sky.

meanings.definition: Located beneath the capsule of an organ.
meanings.sent1: The subcapsular tumor was detected early in the patient's check-up.
meanings.sent2: The subcapsular layer of the liver provides protection.
meanings.sent3: The subcapsular apple was perfectly ripe under its skin.
meanings.sent4: Her smile held a subcapsular sadness that only a few noticed.
meanings.sent5: The subcapsular warmth of the blanket kept her cozy all night.

meanings.definition: Positioned below the outer layer of a structure.
meanings.sent1: The subcapsular cells play a crucial role in the plant's growth.
meanings.sent2: A subcapsular lesion was discovered during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The subcapsular flower bloomed beneath the tall leaves.
meanings.sent4: His words had a subcapsular meaning that hinted at deeper truths.
meanings.sent5: The subcapsular roots of the tree spread far and wide underground.
